snippet.title: Radiant Princess - Poni Ceres - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Yui Morisaki is just a regular university student… Except for the ability to transform into Poni Ceres, a paladin of light and justice! Join her in the fight against Zydarg as the evil organization escalates the conflict in pursuit of total domination!

Radiant Princess - Poni Ceres on Kagura Games Store: https://www.kaguragames.com/product/radiant-princess-poni-ceres/

Radiant Princess - Poni Ceres on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3050140/Radiant_Princess__Poni_Ceres/
